title: Come check out these BEAUTIFUL apartment homes!
posting_body: ['Flats at 1500', '1500 Brandon Glen Way NE, Conyers, GA, 30012', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 79', 'OR Text', '79', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'Interested in more information?', 'See link below:', '<URL>', 'Welcome Home to Flats at 1500', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1032 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Welcome home to a comfortable community with beautiful apartment homes for rent in Conyers, GA.', "At Flats at 1500, we're excited to offer one-, two-, and three-bedroom floor plans.", "Take advantage of large closets, a patio or balcony, and additional storage space — but that's not all!", 'Some of our community amenities include a swimming pool with sundeck, laundry facilities, and a playground.', "Curious about what's nearby the community?", "You'll find that Flats at 1500 is minutes away from I-20, providing direct access to major employers, universities, and downtown Atlanta.", 'Schedule a tour today to see your new home in Conyers, GA.', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets Welcome!', 'Non-aggressive breeds accepted.', 'Weight Restrictions may apply.', 'Please see the office for fees & other details!', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-5:30PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-4:00PM', 'TdF2QYpE49fk']
